## ğŸŒ Proxy Naming Convention
Proxies are named in the format: `ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡· VLESS 01`
Where:
- ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡· = Country flag emoji based on server location
- VLESS = Protocol type (VLESS/VMess/Trojan)
- 01 = Sequential number (01, 02, 03...)
